markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Limited">[Pillar of Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=646)</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God](/Sources.aspx?ID=23) pg. 77</row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Three Actions" /></row>
<row>[material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)
</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute

</row>

</column>

---

You create a large, self-contained cylinder of still fresh water. The pillar has a maximum radius of 15 feet and a maximum height of 60 feet. Creatures inside the pillar can [swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=39) through the water as normal (Swim DC 10), or, if the spell was cast on solid ground, walk along the bottom (which is difficult terrain). Any creature that exits the pillar falls or lands accordingly.
name: Pillar of Water

summary: You create a large, self-contained cylinder of still fresh water
summary_markdown: You create a large, self-contained cylinder of still fresh water
text: Pillar of Water May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse Source Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God pg. 77 Traditions Arcane, Primal Cast Three Actions material, somatic, verbal Range 120 feet Duration 1 minute --- You create a large, self-contained cylinder of still fresh water. The pillar has a maximum radius of 15 feet and a maximum height of 60 feet. Creatures inside the pillar can swim through the water as normal (Swim DC 10), or, if the spell was cast on solid ground, walk along the bottom (which is difficult terrain). Any creature that exits the pillar falls or lands accordingly.
